```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
## Key Insight: The Role of HIV/AIDS

#| label: fig-life-hiv
#| fig-cap: "Countries with higher HIV/AIDS prevalence tend to have significantly lower life expectancy."


# Assuming df_clean is your cleaned dataset
df_clean <- read_csv("data/life_expectancy_clean.csv")

df_clean %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = `HIV/AIDS`, y = `Life expectancy`, color = Status)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.7, size = 2) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, color = "black") +
  labs(
    title = "Impact of HIV/AIDS on Life Expectancy",
    x = "HIV/AIDS (deaths per 1000 people)",
    y = "Life Expectancy (years)"
  ) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14)
```
